item.description:
How to find us
"We'll be meeting at NOON in front of the Monkey's Fist clothing store, which is in Market Square. Allow extra time for parking. In case anyone is late, we'll wait 15 minutes."

Who's hosting?
Gale_2
Come join the fun at Newburyport's Fall Festival this Monday October 11 -- it's a holiday for lots of folks. There will be FREE concerts (rock from 60s and 70s) on the waterfront and in Market Square, artisans will be displaying/selling crafts and art, there will be lots of food vendors from local restaurants, and more. It's from 10 to 5. We're going to meet at noon.

Parking -- There's a municipal lot with 3-hour parking, but it gets filled REAL early. If you drive past that lot (which will be on your right), there is a large "pay" parking lot on the left. It's about a 5-minute walk to Market Square.
item.how_to_find_us: in front of Monkey's fist Clothing Store, in Market Square

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Newburyport Fall Festival
